Published October 29 2014

Dribbblin'

Dribbblin' — Dribbble, the show-and-tell community for designers, just tweaked the letterforms in their logo, and it looks much better. I’ve visited dribbble for four years now, and the inconsistent baseline always bugged me.

Enjoy your day.
